==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=苹果|alt=蓬果-Min Nan:phōng-kó; phông-; pông-,頻果-nonstandard}}

===Etymology===
From abbreviation of the Sanskrit transcription {{zh-l|*頻婆}} + native Chinese {{zh-l|*果|fruit}}.

A {{zh-l|*艹|grass}} radical was added to {{zh-l|*頻}} to make its meaning more apparent. See {{zh-l|*頻婆}} for more.
